name: mosling
description: Go into raid with only a Mosin. No armor, no backpack, and no meds. Only Mosin comrade.

name: The Snake ğŸ
description: Take in any gear you want but you can only crawl the entire raid

name: The GIGA CHAD
description: Go into raid with your absolute most expensive gear. Strike fear into the hearts of all who cross your path and leave no survivors. Rush all engagements and take no prisoners

name: The Nudist ğŸ©²
description: Go into raid with nothing. Pick up nothing. Extract with nothing. If you can complete this task, you are a god

name: Zero to Hero
description: Go into raid with nothing and come out a hero!

name: The Brawler ğŸ‘Š
description: Go into raid with whatever you like but your first kill must be with a melee weapon

name: Peacemaker â˜®ï¸
description: Go into raid with full UN armor. Find an enemy and make peace with them over VOIP

name: 60 Minutes ğŸ¤
description: Successfully complete an interview with another player over VOIP

name: Conga Line ğŸ‘¯
description: Go into raid with a squad and make a conga line. Wiggling required. See how many strangers you can get to join the party!

name: Santa! ğŸ…
description: Aquire a Santa bag. Fill it up with presents. Go into raid and give out gifts!

name: Hot Box ğŸš¬
description: Aquire as many green smoke grenades as you can fit in your inventory. Go into Factory, sit in office, and fill the entire room with green smoke. Bonus points for blasting Snoop Dogg over VOIP

name: John Wayne ğŸ¤
description: Double barrel shotgun and a cowboy hat. Optionally swap the shotgun for the revolver. Yee Haw!

name: Deer in the Headlights ğŸ”¦
description: Go into Factory Night. Attach as many flash lights as you possibly can to your gun of choice. Blind your enemies and burn their retinas

name: Gun Game ğŸ”«
description: Go into raid with any kit you like. However, every enemy you kill, you must replace your current gun with theirs. Rinse and repeat for the whole raid

name: Bomberman ğŸ’£
description: Go into raid with just grenades equiped and blast every enemy away which crosses your path.

name: Be the Scav
description: Equip like a Scav, arm and leg shots only.

name: Frogger ğŸ¸
description: Enter Raid, you can only move by jumping.
